NOTHING: Someone thought it was brilliant to call me wonky because of my eye
That SOMEONE being my father, my eye was all wonky at birth.
I thought it was a dog.
THEPINKCAT: The most sane cat in these woods.
Please put him down, and let me tell you a story
One time, I ventured too far into these woods.
I don't remember how I got there
But it was paradise. No other cats. Just the pink cat. The woods were nothing like I've seen before
There were flowers taller than me
Which isn't that impressive, being me, I'm a pretty tiny cat
But then, I ended up back here. And I regret it very much.
But you seem like a pretty sane cat.
You have an intrinsic want to do things.
The woods haven't sucked the life out of you yet
So maybe I don't mind staying here since you haven't gone bonkers yet.
Not that I haven't gone bonkers, I'm just aware of it.
FLOWER: I've forgotten how to accept gifts properly. But thanks.
